title: Read and write 8.1 GOLD [H666]
description:
Type: Utility (Learning aid)
Platform: Windows 2000 SP4 or above
Size: 643MB

Min specs:
pentium III 800MHz processor
256MB RAM (XP)
512MB RAM (Vista)
600MB free dick space
sound card
good quality speakers
microphone (for speech input)

Read & write gold has a comprehensive toolbar that works with many windows
based applications, such as word processors, email, internat, spreadsheets or
databases, to provide outstanding literacy support.

Key features:
text to speech
phonetic spell checker
*new* screenshot reader
*new* study skills toolbar
*new* summarise tool
word prediction
translator (US only)
speakind dictionary
word wizard
homophone support
web highlighting
one-click scanning
speech maker
daisy reader
fact finder
fact folder
fact mapper
speech input
PDFaloud
pronunciation tutor
scientific calculator
teacher&#039;s toolkit
user definable toolbar
realspeak voices
single word display
